events.title: Errington Farmers Market
events.subtitle: Every Saturday, 10am - 1pm from May through September
events.description: Now in its 45th year! Right across the road from the Hall in the Errington Community Park. Open Saturdays from May to till the end of September - a great place to stock up on all your veggies, bedding plants, baking and preserves and browse the wonderful works of local crafters. Have a coffee, sit, relax and enjoy the live music from the Community Stage and meet friends and neighbours

events.title: 49<sup>th</sup> Annual HI NEIGHBOUR DAY
events.description: A family day for our Errington comunity, with the Pancake Breatkfast, Arts and Crafts Display, Farmers Market, the famous Greater Errington Zucchini Race, Kids Games, the 'big' Parade, and the Hi Neighbour Dance in the evening. For complete details, click: Hi Neighbour Day 2018.

events.title: The Boom Booms - DANCE
events.description: Tickets $25 in stores from Cranky Dog in Parksville, Heaven on Earth in Qualicum Beach or at the Errington General Store and $27.50 online at erringtonhall.tickit.ca. Coffee and great treats available from the kitchen

events.title: COFFEE HOUSE - OPEN-MIC
events.description: Held on the first Saturday of each month. Always an interesting mix of local talents. Admission $5.00 at the door. Musicians and entertainers free. Coffee and treats available from the kitchen. Coffee courtesy of Creekmore Coffee

events.title: KIDS / YOUTH JUICE HOUSE
events.description: The Juice House is an open-mic night for kids, held in a coffee house style. Kids, ages 5 â€“ 15, of all levels and abilities are welcome to come and perform. Admission Adults $5; Kids 12 & under $2; under 2 are free. Under 2yrs Free. Juice, Tea, Coffee, Tea and treats available from the kitchen by donation.
